{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038\cocoasubrtf360 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 The XtreemFS Client for MacOSX was successfully copied on the system.\ \ Currently, there is no GUI available for mounting volumes.\ \ Therefore, please run "mount.xtreemfs" from a Terminal.\ \ Try out with our demo server:\ mkdir ~/xtreemfs\ mount.xtreemfs demo.xtreemfs.org/demo ~/xtreemfs\ \ --\ You can remove the XtreemFS client by executing the script "uninstall_xtreemfs.sh" in a Terminal.}

requirement.message-title: FUSE for OS X is missing.
requirement.message: Please install FUSE for OS X first (http://osxfuse.github.io/).
